DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess safety efficacy patupilone compare pegylated liposomal doxorubicin . Additionally , study assess ability patupilone extend survival time potential beneficial effect woman nonresponsive recurrent ovarian , primary fallopian , primary peritoneal cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Patupilone Versus Doxorubicin Patients With Ovarian , Primary Fallopian , Peritoneal Cancer
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Confirmed diagnosis ovarian , fallopian peritoneal cancer No three chemotherapy regimens Most recent regimen must platinum base Have unresolved bowel obstruction Have previous chemotherapy within 3 week Recovering surgery cause Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion apply .
